title: Please support the rework of MW2

replies.body:
I played that thing's singleplayer years ago (yer I pirated it), it has too many of "those" messages behind everything it's almost unreal (well except dat "No Russian" where they went ape).

I have no idea why would anyone wanna remaster that game tbh (at least not for single player), if anything the game pretty much does about 1 thing right, that is optimisation.

For multiplayer you might as well play CS:GO, which is at its most relevant time. But I don't know, maybe MW2's multiplayer really was something out of ordinary and was truly a blast to play.
